subject: NBA Championship
Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James claimed his second N.B.A. title, posting 37 points and 12 rebounds to close out a taut series against the Spurs, who were seeking their fifth title with Tim Duncan.
snippet: LeBron James claimed his second N.B.A. title, posting 37 points and 12 rebounds to close out a taut series against the Spurs, who were seeking their fifth title with Tim Duncan.
